document_data.name: Grinning Ponies
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grinning Ponies''' was a band of [[halfling]] adventurers who traveled along the [[Trade Way]] and beyond.
document_data.Activities: The Grinning Ponies was a halfling band that traveled along the Trade Way from [[Memnon]] to [[Waterdeep]] and east and back the length of [[Elturgard]].
document_data.History:
The name of the band came from the halflings' mounts ([[horse|ponies]]) and the name of the year [[1481 DR]], the Year of the Grinning Halfling.

In 1481 DR, [[Spider Parrafin|Spider Topolino]] (the reborn [[Regis]]) joined the Grinning Ponies while they were stationed at [[Boareskyr Bridge]].
document_data.Members: In 1481 DR, the band had twelve members, including [[Doregardo]] (the leader), [[Showithal Terdidy]], and [[Spider Parrafin|Spider Topolino]] ([[Regis]]).
